title: User Login with Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a customer, I want to log in using secure credentials with multi-factor authentication, so that I can protect my account from unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria: Users must pass multi-factor authentication to access their accounts.
test_cases: Given a registered user, When they log in, Then they must verify their identity using multi-factor authentication.

title: Data Protection via Encryption Standards
description: As a customer, I want my data to be protected through encryption, so that my personal information remains secure.
attributes_and_rules: Implement encryption at rest and in transit.
acceptance_criteria: All user data should be encrypted at rest and in transit.
test_cases: Given user data storage, When data is stored or transmitted, Then it should be encrypted.

title: User Activity Logging
description: As a customer, I want my activities to be logged, so that I can monitor access and detect suspicious activities.
attributes_and_rules: Logins and critical actions should be recorded.
acceptance_criteria: User activities must be logged and retrievable for auditing.
test_cases: Given any user action, When it is performed, Then it should be logged with a timestamp.

epic_title: Responsive Portal Design and User Interface
title: Responsive Interface for Desktop, Tablet, and Mobile
description: As a user, I want a consistent interface across my devices, so that I can easily use the banking portal on desktop, tablet, or mobile.
acceptance_criteria: The interface must adapt to different screen sizes and devices.
test_cases: Given the portal, When accessed from different devices, Then the user experience should be consistent.

epic_title: Responsive Portal Design and User Interface
title: Intuitive Navigation Design
description: As a user, I want intuitive navigation, so that I can find what I need quickly and easily.
attributes_and_rules: Menus should be clear and logically structured.
acceptance_criteria: Users can navigate to key sections with minimal clicks.
test_cases: Given the portal, When users navigate, Then they should easily find important sections.

title: Dynamic Dashboard based on User Profile
description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can quickly see my key financial information.
attributes_and_rules: Customize based on user profile and eligibility.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard content should dynamically change based on the user's profile.
test_cases: Given a user profile, When they access the dashboard, Then it should display relevant information dynamically.

title: Quick Access to Key Features
description: As a user, I want quick access to key features, so that I can manage my banking activities efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Must include account balances, notifications, and shortcuts.
acceptance_criteria: Key features must be accessible directly from the dashboard.
test_cases: Given the dashboard, When users interact with it, Then they should access key features with minimal steps.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Requests Workflow
title: Submit Account Opening Requests
description: As a user, I want to submit account opening requests via the portal, so that I can open new accounts easily from anywhere.
acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to complete account opening requests with guided validation steps.
test_cases: Given the account opening section, When users follow guided steps, Then the requests should be validated and submitted.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Requests Workflow
title: Track Service Modification Requests
description: As a user, I want to track my service modification requests, so that I can monitor the progress of my ongoing requests.
acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to track the status of their service requests with real-time updates.
test_cases: Given submitted service requests, When users check status, Then they should see real-time updates.

title: Update Users with Real-Time Notifications
description: As a user, I want to receive real-time notifications on my request status, so that I am always informed about my request progress.
acceptance_criteria: Users must be notified in real-time about status changes in their requests.
test_cases: Given a user request, When its status changes, Then the user should be notified immediately.
